creator: cristina@radcom.ro
text:
Hi,
that is the generated stack trace when I'm trying to load the same request 
simultaneous from 2 diferent sessions . How can I resolve this?
Cris.
------
2002-05-20 14:13:17 - Ctx( /cronos ): Exception in: R( /cronos + /stloy/statisti
cirez.jsp + null) - javax.servlet.ServletException
        at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServlet.service(JspServlet.java:508)
        at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:853)
        at org.apache.tomcat.core.ServletWrapper.doService(ServletWrapper.java:4
05)
        at org.apache.tomcat.core.Handler.service(Handler.java:287)
        at org.apache.tomcat.core.ServletWrapper.service(ServletWrapper.java:372
)
        at org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.internalService(ContextManager.
java:806)
        at org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.service(ContextManager.java:752
)
        at org.apache.tomcat.service.http.HttpConnectionHandler.processConnectio
n(HttpConnectionHandler.java:213)
        at org.apache.tomcat.service.TcpWorkerThread.runIt(PoolTcpEndpoint.java:
416)
        at org.apache.tomcat.util.ThreadPool$ControlRunnable.run(ThreadPool.java
:501)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:484)
Root cause:
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
        <<no stack trace available>>
-----

Marking as INVALID, since the bugzilla is not a user support forum.

Please try with a stable Tomcat release (any of 3.3, 4.1.34, or 5.5.17) and
report problems to tomcat-user for better responses.
creator: sriramnrn@gmail.com
